summary: This is an email from court reporter Paula Speer transmitting the public portion of a transcript from a hearing in the case US v. Maxwell (20-cr-330) on November 10, 2021. It notes that a sealed portion will be sent separately.

persons.name: Paula Speer
persons.context: She is the sender of the email, transmitting the public portion of the court transcript and indicating she will handle the sealed portion separately.

events.title: Hearing in US v. Maxwell
events.description: A court hearing was held in the case US v. Maxwell (20-cr-330). The public portion of the transcript is being distributed.

keyFacts: A hearing in the criminal case against Ghislaine Maxwell (US v. Maxwell, 20-cr-330) took place on November 10, 2021.
The transcript of the hearing has both a public portion and a sealed portion.
Court reporter Paula Speer is responsible for distributing the transcript portions via email.
